summary: Frontend testing of Community Hub enhancements and Help Center FAQ integration. All features tested successfully. Profile cards show enhanced node card data (callsigns, status badges, connection info, battery, blood type for admins, equipment count). Profile drawer has tabbed interface (Profile, Medical, Equipment, Device). FAQ button removed from header. Help Center has new FAQ section with 11 collapsible categories. Mobile responsiveness verified.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED in communityMockData.js - no real backend integration
Privacy redaction implemented correctly: medical and location fields hidden for non-admin users when privacy settings are off
Blood type only visible to admins (line 2255: profile.medical?.bloodType && isAdmin)
Profile cards show: callsign, userStatus badge, connection type/strength, battery %, blood type (admin only), equipment count

Profile drawer tabs: Profile (physical description, skills, certifications, emergency contact), Medical (blood type, allergies, conditions, medications), Equipment (loadout list), Device (CPU/RAM/battery/temp, location with coordinates)
FAQ button successfully removed from Header.jsx - only Settings and Theme toggle remain on right side
Help Center FAQ section has 11 categories: Connect, Navigate, Comms Hub, Map & GPS, Power, Library, Media, Files, Profiles, Admin, Fix It
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by generateMockProfiles() in communityMockData.js with 15 profiles containing rich node card data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Community Hub enhancements fully tested. Key test IDs: community-btn, tab-directory, profile-card-*, drawer-tab-profile, drawer-tab-medical, drawer-tab-equipment, drawer-tab-device, help-center-btn, faq-category-*. Profile cards show callsigns in quotes, status badges (GOOD/OKAY/NEED_HELP/OFFLINE), connection type with strength %, battery %, blood type (admin only), equipment count. Profile drawer has 4 tabs with detailed information. FAQ removed from header, moved to Help Center as collapsible categories.

faq_button_removed_from_header.details: FAQ button no longer exists in header. Only Settings (gear icon) and Theme toggle (sun/moon) remain on right side.

help_center_faq_section.details: Help Center has 'Frequently Asked Questions' section with 11 collapsible categories: Connect, Navigate, Comms Hub, Map & GPS, Power, Library, Media, Files, Profiles, Admin, Fix It

faq_categories_expandable.details: Each FAQ category expands to show questions, and each question expands to show the answer

profile_cards_callsigns.details: Profile cards display callsigns in quotes (e.g., "PHOENIX", "GUARDIAN", "SUPPLY")

profile_cards_status_badges.details: Profile cards show status badges: GOOD (green), OKAY (yellow), NEED_HELP (red), OFFLINE (gray)

profile_cards_connection_info.details: Profile cards show connection type (Wi-Fi, Mesh, LoRa, Cellular, Offline) with signal strength percentage

profile_cards_battery.details: Profile cards show battery percentage with color coding (green >50%, yellow 20-50%, red <20%)

profile_cards_blood_type_admin_only.details: Blood type (ðŸ©¸ O+, A+, B+, etc.) only visible when viewing as Admin role

profile_cards_equipment_count.details: Profile cards show equipment count (e.g., '2 equipment items', '4 equipment items')

profile_drawer_tabbed_interface.details: Profile drawer has 4 tabs: Profile, Medical, Equipment, Device

profile_drawer_profile_tab.details: Profile tab shows: Physical Description (age, height, weight, education, hair, eyes, features), Skills, Languages, Certifications, Emergency Contact, Notes

profile_drawer_medical_tab.details: Medical tab shows: Blood Type, Allergies, Conditions, Medications

profile_drawer_equipment_tab.details: Equipment tab shows: Equipment Loadout with item name and category (e.g., 'Medical Kit (Full Trauma) - Medical')

profile_drawer_device_tab.details: Device tab shows: Model, Battery %, CPU %, RAM %, Temperature (Â°C/Â°F), Last Known Location (Lat, Lon, Grid, Accuracy) with Copy and Open Maps buttons

privacy_redaction_non_admin.details: Privacy redaction implemented: medical and location fields hidden for non-admin users when profile privacy settings are off. Blood type only shown to admins.

mobile_responsiveness_header.details: Mobile header shows LOGS, Community, Help buttons with compact layout

mobile_responsiveness_community_hub.details: Community Hub works on mobile (390x844): tabs, profile cards, and profile drawer all responsive

mobile_responsiveness_profile_cards.details: Profile cards display correctly on mobile with all enhanced data visible

mocked_apis_list: generateMockProfiles() - returns 15 profiles with rich node card data
generateCommsPreview() - returns pinned bulletins and activity
generateMockIncidents() - returns incident data for admin view
All profile data including: callsign, userStatus, connection, physical, medical, equipment, device, location
